Package imagingbook.pub.corners

Class Corner

  • java.lang.Object
    • imagingbook.pub.corners.Corner
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Pnt2d, java.lang.Comparable<Corner>
    public class Corner
extends java.lang.Object
implements Pnt2d, java.lang.Comparable<Corner>
    This class represents a 2D corner. A corner is essentially a Pnt2d plus a scalar quantity q for the corner strength.
    Version:
    2020/10/02
